content:
Hi All,

Is there any specs or companion guide for USCDI?

Thanks,
Ozlem Kurt

Please don't raise the same question in multiple places at the same time. Only cross-post if someone has explicitly asked you to do so or if you acknowledge in your post that you've already asked elsewhere and provide a link to the other thread so that discussion can happen in only one place.

Lloyd McKenzie said:

Please don't raise the same question in multiple places at the same time. Only cross-post if someone has explicitly asked you to do so or if you acknowledge in your post that you've already asked elsewhere and provide a link to the other thread so that discussion can happen in only one place.

Sure, I will. Since my question related to Payer is still not answered, I am advised to post in multiple places.
Thanks,
Ozlem Kurt
The timeframe to expect a response is a couple of business days...

Lloyd McKenzie said:

The timeframe to expect a response is a couple of business days...

OK. Payer question is posted on May 12, so it is still in a couple of business day range I guess.
Thanks,
Ozlem Kurt
Did you review the C-CDA companion guide - http://www.hl7.org/implement/standards/product_brief.cfm?product_id=447
